summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1457, for the improvement of 24th Avenue North from Helen Street to East Galer Street, and Turner Way from 23rd Avenue North to 24th Avenue North; by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 15708 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
